1670080.name: Tiny Room Stories: Rift Escape
1670080.description:
You are in Rift Escape.



Tiny Room Stories: Rift Escape it is a point and click adventure game with elements of the “Escape the room” mechanics.

The game world consists of isometric dioramas of different places, rooms, dungeons, etc. united by a common story. A key feature of the gameplay is the ability to rotate dioramas, thus changing the point of view, which allows you to see new places and objects.

The story begins with the disappearance of the protagonist's wife. You have to go in search of her, traveling through various space-time dimensions, solving various puzzles and riddles along the way, to find out the mystery of her disappearance.



All game it is a different locations from the fantasy to the sci-fi connected between with mystic story.

Features

  • Fully 3D levels that can and should be rotated to inspect them from another angle.
  • Variety of locations from the usual residential building to the ancient catacombs.
  • Variety of themes from the fantasy to the sci-fi
  • Interactive world
  • Many puzzles and riddles
  • Story, with unexpected plot twists.
